Class WaitingWorkClient

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
WorkClient
public class WaitingWorkClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements WorkClient

A work client that waits for its (dataless) worker to finish.

Author:
Spence Koehler

setWorkJob

public void setWorkJob(WorkJob workJob)
Set the work job for the work client.

This is for the client to monitor the work job's status so that it can stop serving up work when appropriate.
